\n
"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Employee Details "}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "employee_id", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Employee ID"}, {"fieldname": "employee_name", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Employee Name"}, {"fieldname": "desigination", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Designation"}, {"fieldname": "department", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Department"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "resident_id_number", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Resident ID Number(QID)"}, {"fieldname": "date_of_joining", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Date of Joining"}, {"fieldname": "company__division", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Company / Division"}, {"fieldname": "company_email", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Company Email"}, {"fieldname": "mobile_number", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Mobile Number"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Requested Details "}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "date", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Requested Date"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "no_of_copies", "print_hide": 0, "label": "No of Copies "}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "remarks", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Remarks"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "For Office Use"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "additional_info", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Notes"}, {"fieldname": "hod", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Head of the Department"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "hr", "print_hide": 0, "label": "HR & Administration"}, {"fieldname": "md", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Managing Director"}]
html:
{{doc.name}}

Business Card

EMPLOYEE DETAILS

Employee ID {{doc.employee_id or ''}} Employee Name {{doc.employee_name or ''}}
Resident ID Number(QID) {{doc.resident_id_number or ''}} Date of Joining {{frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.date_of_joining or '')}}
Department {{doc.department or ''}} Designation {{doc.desigination or ''}}
Mobile Number {{doc.mobile_number or ''}} Company Email {{doc.company_email or ''}}
Company / Division {{doc.company__division or ''}}

REQUEST DETAILS

Requested Date {{frappe.utils.format_date (doc.requested_date or "")}} No of Copies {{doc.no_of_copies or ''}}
Remarks{{doc.remarks or '-'}}

For Office Use

Notes{{doc.additional_info or '-'}}
Head of the Department{{doc.hod or '-'}}
HR & Administration{{doc.hr or '-'}}
Managing Director{{doc.md or '-'}}
Remarks{{doc.remarks or '-'}}
